root.name: Cardcaptor Sakura: Tomoe Shougakkou Daiundoukai
root.description: OverviewCard Captor Sakura: Tomoe Shougakkou Daiundoukai is a game developed and published by MTO for the Game Boy Color platform. Card Captor Sakura: Tomoe Shougakkou Daiundoukai is based on the anime series Card Captor Sakura and was never released outside of Japan.
